Crosswalked to EpiDoc XML from both

div.p: To Heron, royal scribe of the Memphite nome From Melas, son of Areios, mother Kaleis, of the class of those from Memphis without a manual trade registered in the 2nd quarter. I register myself and my family as lodgers for the house of Isidoros, son of Anoubion alias Pankrates, in which I live, for the house-by-house registration of the past 14th year of Aurelius Antoninus Caesar, the lord, myself Melas for the 14th year, 51 years old, and my children born of two different wives, on the one hand, of Tesagris, Memphite, a son Melas, 1 year old, on the other hand of Herieus, a daugher, Tnephremphis, 17 years old. The above mentioned landlord [I]sidor[os] is present and is security for our poll-tax and I swear by the fortune of our lord, [Au]relius Antoninus Caesar that the above mentioned is true. Year 15 of Imperator Caesar Marcus Aurelius Antoninus Augustus Armeniacus Medicus Parthicus Germanicus Maximus, Phaophi 4.
